descriptionHtml:
****************************************************************
v1.2
****************************************************************
-Resolves issues from v1.1
All Doom Skeletons can now attack
*Note Doom Skeleton Archer will attack close range most of the time. 

I have created a new way of obtaining the spells:

Press the (~) key and type this to teleport to a special room containing all the spells
\"coc ritsroom\"

To get back press the ~ key again and type
\"coc whiterun\"

Stats

Doom Skeleton Warrior 1H and 2H stats are the same

                               Health-1510
                               Magicka-0
                               Stamina-825
                               1H-100
                               2H-100
                               Block-100
                               Heavy Armor-100
                               Sneak-100

              
Mage Stats
100-onehanded
100-sneak
100-conjuration
100-destruction
100-restoration

1510-health
500-magicka
300-stamina

Archer Stats
100-onehanded
100-archery
100-sneak

1510-health
0-magic
575-stamina

All Doom Skeletons cost 250 magicka to cast

Issues
Doom Skeleton Mage can attack but sadly cannot cast spells.

****************************************************************
v1.1
****************************************************************

Description
-Adds new classes to Doom Skeleton


How to get the spells
Use console commands for the time being:
Press the (~) key then type in the following depending on what spell you want...

For Conjure Doom Skeleton Mage

\"player.addspell 22000D77\"

For Conjure Doom Skeleton Archer

\"player.addspell 22000D71\"

For Conjure Doom Skeleton Warrior 2H (Original Doom Skeleton)

\"player.addspell 22000D65\"

For Conjure Doom Skeleton Warrior 1H

\"player.addspell 22000D6B\"

Issues
1. Mage cannot attack but it will summon a frost atronach to help you.
2. Archer attacks with its hands when close up instead of dagger ( It\'s hands are actually pretty powerful though)
3. Conjure Doom Skeleton Warrior 2H is not working currently. However you might be able to summon it by downloading v1.0 as well and obtaining the book from the fire to the left of the Jarl of Whiterun\'s throne.
****************************************************************
v1.0
****************************************************************
Description
- Spell summons a gigantic skeleton with
a ebony greatsword.

Location
-Dragonsreach in the fire to the left of the Jarl\'s throne.

                                    Stats
                               Health-1510
                               Magicka-0
                               Stamina-825
                               1H-100
                               2H-100
                               Block-100
                               Heavy Armor-100
                               Sneak-100

                             Magicka Cost: 500
author: Rits11
